snippet: Opponents of a negotiated agreement with Iran have no better answers on how to resolve a breakdown in confidence.
abstract: Editorial calls on Obama administration to remain committed to attaining best deal possible with Iran over its nuclear weapons program despite reactionary opposition from conservatives, Israel and Saudi Arabia; holds best way to achieve that is through a negotiated deal that limits uranium enrichment, curbs the plutonium program and allows for maximum international monitoring.
lead_paragraph: Opponents of a negotiated agreement with Iran have no better answers on how to resolve a breakdown in confidence.

headline.main: Iran Nuclear Talks: Unfinished, but Alive
headline.print_headline: Iran Nuclear Talks: Unfinished, but Alive
